result.arabic_text: قُلۡ مَا يَعۡبَؤُاْ بِكُمۡ رَبِّي لَوۡلَا دُعَآؤُكُمۡۖ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبۡتُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامَۢا
result.translation: Jedhi: “Odoo kadhaan (Iimaanni) keessan jiraachuu baatee, silaa Gooftaan kiyya homattuu isin hin lakkaa’u ture, Dhugumatti isin sobsiiftanii jirtu, adabbiin (isiniif qophaa’e) isin qabataa ta’a.”
